Texts.Chs: 一个远古神器、一本远古之书和五块刀剑碎片。一定要正确说出祷文，否则你就会死。
Texts.Eng: 1 Elder Artifact, 1 Elder Tomb and 5 Blade Shards. Be sure to utter the prayer correctly or it will be you who shall be destroyed.

Texts.Chs: 如果你希望更强大，必须献上三个祭品，然后念出祷文。
Texts.Eng: If the hunted truly wishes to becomes the hunter he must place these three objects upon an alter an offer a prayer for destruction of his enemies.
